alert.note: Alert for Arlington, Falls Church, Alexandria; Central and Southeast Prince William, Manassas, Manassas Park; Eastern Loudoun; Fairfax; Northern Fauquier; Northwest Prince William; Rappahannock; Southern Fauquier; Stafford; Western Loudoun (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 01 at 7:26PM EDT until April 02 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, northeast, northern and southern Maryland, The District of Columbia and northern and northwest Virginia. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
